channel.title: I have an Idea
channel.description: Mabye The script could use the browser ( Firefox ), and use tabs to "view" other things. I do this all the time when I am playing legit to look at things. I don't know if this is possible, but it would be really hard...

item.title: I have an Idea
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“Chicken headless, post:8, topic:5460”][quote author=ruler link=topic=7229.msg75671#msg75671 date=1153421228]
srl doesn’t like multi-client cheating. since that leads to cheating for cash.

They cheat for enoyment not items,profit, other things.

However if you want to multi-cliet cheat with srl, ubi is for you.
[/quote]

srl cant like anything…

its an include…[/quote]
i ment the owners of it.

Read full topic

item.title: I have an Idea
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Infintry001:

i htink he means that a lot of ppl (like me) switch focus when playing runescpae. I, for example, fight monks and surf the web at the same time. Well, i switch between them

Ohhh, that wouldn’t be to hard. But it would require all users have these settings, and Firefox.

I use the Official Runescape Client downloaded from there site for playing/autoing on Runescape.

Read full topic

item.title: I have an Idea
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Whats wrong with autoing on one account at a time? Seriously. Why auto on two? Sure, you might get a little extra cash, but who really cares? SRL is not for getting cash in Runescape. I’m pretty sure its in the SRL Manual somewhere how we don’t care about Runescape Gp.

Read full topic

item.title: I have an Idea
item.dc:creator: @roberty_bob roberty bob
item.description:
@roberty_bob wrote:

Yep it is very hard, very inefficient and impractical…
I think its better just to use something such as UBI if you want to do other stuff while you auto. I think it still works…? haven’t done any testing on it for ages. There was talk Jaagex had stuffed it up? or maybe just for multiple useage?

Or just use another computer or a virtual machine like me. arrrgg my SRL VM tute is lost.

Read full topic
